attributes.name: Mortgage Calculator
attributes.summary:
üè† Mortgage Calculator

Easily estimate your monthly mortgage payments and understand where your money goes ‚Äî all in one simple, visual tool.

üí° What It Does

This calculator helps you break down the full cost of homeownership. Just enter a few details about your potential home and loan, and you'll get:

Your estimated monthly mortgage payment

A clear view of how much goes to:
- Principal & Interest
- Property Taxes
- Home Insurance
- HOA Fees
- Total lifetime costs over the life of the loan

üìã What You Can Input
- Home Price
- Down Payment (%)
- Loan Term (Years)
- Interest Rate (%)
- Monthly Property Tax
- Monthly Insurance
- Monthly HOA Fees

üìä Visual Breakdown

You'll also see a colorful donut chart that shows exactly what portion of your monthly payment goes where ‚Äî no guessing.

üéØ Perfect For
- First-time home buyers
- Real estate agents helping clients compare options
- Anyone planning for a big purchase

‚öôÔ∏è How It Helps
Know what to expect before you buy:
- Set realistic budgets
- Compare different scenarios
- Understand the true cost of a mortgage
